titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 4038), entitled "For the relief of Adrian Rodriguez", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/5/2007--Introduced. Refers H.R. 4038 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.
